CONTRACT_ID: If you need to contact us, please submit a question using the Get Updates page or contact the Contracting Authority via email. Contact Information
description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENTThe Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.Item 1, GSIN: N6110, NSN: 00-5000360, STARTER, MOTORPart No.: K235-6C, NCAGE: 10543, CANADIAN GENERAL ELECTRIC CO LTD.ORPart No.: 1C5900-A1, NCAGE: 02989, GENERAL ELECTRIC COMPANYORPart No.: AD22557PC20, NCAGE: 47750, PLAINVILLE ELECTRICAL PRODUCTSQuantity: 9, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.Item 2, GSIN: N6110, NSN: 00-5000360, STARTER, MOTORPart No.: K235-6C, NCAGE: 10543, CANADIAN GENERAL ELECTRIC CO LTD.ORPart No.: 1C5900-A1, NCAGE: 02989, GENERAL ELECTRIC COMPANYORPart No.: AD22557PC20, NCAGE: 47750, PLAINVILLE ELECTRICAL PRODUCTSQuantity: 9, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
duration_in_months: Not constantly & Multiple Alternating Proposals Possible
